source.e22e246b:
totalfemale= df.loc[(df["Sex"] == "female")].count()
print("Total number of female passangers:", totalfemale['Survived'])

totalmale= df.loc[(df["Sex"] == "male")].count()
print("Total number of male passangers:", totalmale['Survived'])


non_survived_male= df.loc[(df["Sex"] == "male") & (df["Survived"] == 0)].count()
print("Number of male passangers who did not survive the accident:", non_survived_male["Survived"])

non_survived_female= df.loc[(df["Sex"] == "female") & (df["Survived"] == 0)].count()

print("Number of female passangers who did not survive the accident:", non_survived_female["Survived"])

percentage_male= non_survived_male["Survived"] / totalmale['Survived']
print("Percentage of male mortality:" , percentage_male)

percentage_female= non_survived_female["Survived"] / totalfemale['Survived']
print("Percentage of female mortality:" , percentage_female)
